timelines.description:
Projct dir : patch/sentinel Description: build upon Placard200908 to make a recording. Files:- Video: processingApps/net.robmunro.experiment/Placard200908Experiment.java Audio: patch/sentinel/sentinel.pd
----------------------------------------------------------- Operation:- ===================================== PD audio patch: patch/sentinel/sentinel.pd requires: zexy OSC received: /ping/f - ping freq /ping/t - ping time /ping/m - ? (not connected)
/base/n - note (midi) /base/offst - offset to second oscillator /base/dist - distortion level /base/f - filter frequency
/drm1 - base drum /hh - hi hat
OSC sent: see inside test_fft object /env x Y - the envelope data frame(x=blocknum, Y=block) split int 200 bolcks for 1024 frame /fft x Y - (similar to env) ===================================== ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ Processing Video patch: processingApps/net.robmunro.experiment/Placard200908Experiment.java
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
########################################### Timeline patch :- Basic idea is to start off with bass, bell, drm1 then random ping paths and gradually fade out to base and move to pingFreq2&3 with hi hat.
To do: better waty to fade rand ping to ping notes. find a mid freq sound to fit in beetween ping and drums.
Sound : ping pingFreq is the note progression: each has quite different sounds. pingFreq-0: is simple random (sends /ping/f) pingFreq-2&3: use scales object to calc freq (sends /ping/n) - the 3rd exp down on the event, offset is set by $e:pingVars:pingNote::[0] * Its good to play with short and long sustain times on the ping envelope, short is sparse, long is fuller. * there is an event at the start of pingFreq-2 to set random offset. but its not so nice triggering every loop needs to be 2,3 or 4 so the new pitch can set in before it changes again.
Sound: base baseNoteSeq: sequence for base notes. baseSlide-1&2: sweep the filter frequency in two different curves. there is a filter on /base/n to trigger the bell (/base/n $e:bellVars:bellTrigHigh:f)
drums:- drm1-1&2: base drum. drm2-1&2: snare drum. drmSeq: plays one of each. ###########################################
